data.name: Goblin
data.description:
Goblin

Units:
-30% buy cost
-5% hit points

Buildings:
+10% attack rate

Upgrades:
+3Lv Ranged Weapons

Traits: Goblins have frail little bodies so they have to relay on their wits and more or less powerful mechanical contraptions. And, of course, explosions. Lots and lots and lots of EXPLOSIONS.

Difficulty: Advanced

auras.name: Camouflage Aura
auras.description:
Hides your buildings
(1500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Repair Aura
auras.description:
+4 HP/s unit regeneration
(affects mechanical units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Sharpshooter Aura
auras.description:
+20% building damage
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Rigged to BLOW [F]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Demolition "Experts"

Your units will explode upon death dealing 20/25/30/35 damage in 150 AoE.
(upgraded by SEIF Handling)
Your destroyed buildings will send rockets which deal 500 damage to all enemy buildings.
(reveals other player bases)

Type: Trolling

spells.name: Rigged to BLOW
spells.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Demolition "Experts"

Your units will explode upon death dealing 20/25/30/35 damage in 150 AoE.
(upgraded by SEIF Handling)
Your destroyed buildings will send rockets which deal 500 damage to all enemy buildings.
(reveals other player bases)

Type: Trolling

spells.name: Detonate [C]
spells.description:
Destroy clockwise Armory.
Deals 2x damage.

spells.name: Detonate [X]
spells.description:
Destroy middle Armory.
Deals 2x damage.

spells.name: Detonate [Z]
spells.description:
Destroy counter clockwise Armory.
Deals 2x damage.

bonuses.name: Hidden and Dangerous [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Got Wrencz

Reduces spell damage to Brawler, Gangster, Sapper, Bombardier and Shredder by 15%. Your units become invisible. Unit Evasion is increased by 5%.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Assaulter [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of STRAPON ArmorKit

Assaulter replaces Zeppelin
Support Unit (Ground)
-100 HP
Abilities:
Suppression Aura (Disable Aura)
(-10% speed in 700 AoE)
(does not affect Special unit)
TRANSFORM! (Self Spell)
(can turn into Air unit)
Upgrades used:
ROCKETS!!!
JUNK Armor
MOAR Rockets
STRAPON ArmorKit

Type: Debuffing

units.name: Assaulter
units.description:
Support Unit
Strong Vs Melee Unit
Weak Vs Heroes

(150 damage in 800 AoE)
Upgrades used:

JUNK Armor
BOOM Rounds
Let it Rein
Bling Aura
STRAPON ArmorKit

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Item Merchant
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [X]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [C]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Special Unit.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Strength Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Agility Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Special Unit.

bonuses.name: Spiked Fortifications [C]
bonuses.description:
Increases hit points of all your buildings by 1500, deals 50 damage to melee attacker and reduces spell damage by 50%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon / Base Defence

spells.name: Spiked Fortifications
spells.description:
Increases hit points of all your buildings by 1500, deals 50 damage to melee attacker and reduces spell damage by 50%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon / Base Defence

spells.name: Emergency Repair (Lv1) [S]
spells.description:
Restores 100 HP over 30 sec.
(can affect mechanical units)
(can target your enemy as well)
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero

spells.name: Chain Lightning - [Level 4]
spells.description: Calls forth a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 13 times, dealing <AOcl,DataA4> damage on the primary target. Each jump deals less damage.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.name: Fuck Heroes (Lv1)
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+20% damage reduction
+3 armor reduction
+1000 Aura range

spells.name: Cripple (Lv1) [W]
spells.description:
Reduces damage by 25% for 60 sec.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

spells.name: Chain Lightning - [Level 4]
spells.description: Calls forth a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 13 times, dealing <AOcl,DataA4> damage on the primary target. Each jump deals less damage.

towerUpgrades.name: Let it Rein
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: +400% attack rate
Affects: Rocket Buggy
(has 15 second duration)

Lv1: ends after about 2 or 3 attacks
Lv2: ends after about 3 or 4 attacks
Lv3: ends after about 4 or 5 attacks
Lv4: ends after about 5 or 6 attacks

(deals 45 self damage on each attack)

towerUpgrades.name: Got Wrencz
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: healing ability
Affects: Brawler and Gangster
(affects mechanical units only)

Lv1: restores 60 HP
Lv2: restores 120 HP
Lv3: restores 180 HP
Lv4: restores 240 HP

towerUpgrades.name: MOAR Rockets
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: multishot for speed penalty
Affects: Zeppelin

Lv1: 3 targets, -40% attack rate
Lv2: 3 targets, -30% attack rate
Lv3: 3 targets, -20% attack rate
Lv4: 3 targets, -10% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: BOOM Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to stun
Affects: Rocket Buggy and Rocket Tower
(has half duration on Heroes)

Lv1: 12% chance for 2 sec stun
Lv2: 24% chance for 2 sec stun
Lv3: 36% chance for 2 sec stun
Lv4: 48% chance for 2 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Bling Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus attack rate to nearby units
Affects: Shredder and Rocket Buggy
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: +5% attack rate in 400 AoE
Lv2: +10% attack rate in 500 AoE
Lv3: +15% attack rate in 600 AoE
Lv4: +20% attack rate in 700 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Scrap Salvage
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: gold and heal for a kill
Affects: Shredder

Lv1: 4 gold and 50 HP
Lv2: 8 gold and 75 HP
Lv3: 12 gold and 100 HP
Lv4: 16 gold and 125 HP

towerUpgrades.name: STRAPON ArmorKit
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: HP and regeneration
Affects: All mechanical units

Lv1: +50 hit points, +1 HP/s
Lv2: +100 hit points, +2 HP/s
Lv3: +150 hit points, +3 HP/s
Lv4: +200 hit points, +4 HP/s

towerUpgrades.name: Ryl HAVOC
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: splash damage (sometimes friendly)
Affects: Shredder

Lv1: 20% damage, 12% to be collateral
Lv2: 30% damage, 14% to be collateral
Lv3: 40% damage, 16% to be collateral
Lv4: 50% damage, 18% to be collateral

towerUpgrades.name: Demolition "Experts"
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in every 2nd wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has KaBOOM Byach! (explosion on death)
200/300/400/500 damage in 200 AoE
Lv2: has BUUBY Trep (invisible damage trap)
100/200/300 damage in 200 AoE
Lv3: has Scrap Mine (invisible stun trap)
60/90 sec duration, 3/4 sec stun
Lv4: has Pocket Tower (attacks enemies)
summons 2 Towers for 90 sec

t1spell.name: Goblin Mine [Z]
t1spell.description:
Dyls 300 damage in 170 AoE.
Stuns for 8 seconds.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Holy Fire [X]
t2spell.description:
Sends ROCKETS at enemies.
Each rocket dyls 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.description:

Stuns for 8 seconds.

skills.description:

skills.name: The Horde - Goblin
skills.description:
Units:
-30% buy cost
-5% hit points

Buildings:
+10% attack rate

Upgrades:
+3Lv Ranged Weapons

Traits: Goblins have frail little bodies so they have to relay on their wits and more or less powerful mechanical contraptions. And, of course, explosions. Lots and lots and lots of EXPLOSIONS.

Difficulty: Advanced

skills.name: Sacrifice Ritual [C]
skills.description:
Kill friendly unit to summon help.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

skills.name: BOOM Rounds (Lv1)
skills.description:
12% chance to stun for 2 sec.

(has half duration on Heroes)

barrack.name: Armory (Lv2)
barrack.description:
Gives:
Can train Heroes
+750 hit points
+2 armor
+7% unit spawning rate
+1 Melee Unit
+2 Siege Units

skills.name: Repair (Lv1) [Q]
skills.description:
Restores 100 HP over 15 seconds.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

heroes.name: Goblin Basher
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Cluster Rockets (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in an area
(125-275 area of effect)

Pulverize (Passive Skill)
20% for 120-240 area damage

Electroshock (Damage Spell)
125-275 damage, 20-32% slow
(350-500 area of effect)

Repair Protocol (Self Spell)
restores 400-1000 HP over 10 sec

heroes.name: Spider Bot
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Overload (Support Spell)
15-27% attack rate bonus
(affects mechanical units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Refracting Beam (Damage Spell)
250-400 damage, 4-8 units

Profit Aura (Support Aura)
grants 2-8 gold for a kill
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Bribe (Disable Spell)
controls unit every 30-15 sec
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

heroes.name: Tinker
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Demolisher

Can learn:
Cluster Rockets (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in an area
(125-275 area of effect)

Pocket Tower (Summoning Spell)
summons 2 immobile units

Demolition Aura (Disable Aura)
4-10 building armor reduction

Repair (Healing Spell)
300-600 HP to 5 units
(affects mechanical units only)

heroes.name: SUPA MECH
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Melee/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Cluster Rockets (Damage Spell)
325-475 damage in an area
(250-400 area of effect)

Overcharge (Self Spell)
40-50% attack rate bonus
(deals 20-30 damage/sec)

Core Meltdown (Passive Skill)
2000-4000 damage on death
(doesn't affect buildings)
(full/half damage in 250/500 AoE)

LIFT-OFF (Self Spell)
turn into Air unit for 11-17 sec

magic.name: SEIF Handling (Lv1) [W]
magic.description:
Gives:
Bombardier can use Blind Grenade
25% miss chance for 10 sec

+12 Sapper damage

125 damage in 200 AoE
+12 Bombardier damage
+0.5 MP/sec Bombardier mana reg
